channel.title: Player killing - Hybrid - DELTA
channel.description:
I was wondering if some one could redirect me to any tut's that could maybe make my player killing system better for my server? based off of delta.
i just want to try to get as near perfect pking. ANY TUTORIALS THAT DEAL WITH PKING WILL HELP!
THANK you!

item.title: Player killing - Hybrid - DELTA
item.dc:creator: @EALclan EALclan
item.description:
@EALclan wrote:

[quote=“Eclipse639, post:4, topic:426019”]If he’s using Delta, then he has no shot at gaining any real java knowledge.
Delta is crap.[/quote]

You know what…
Ill pm you when i get my server online.
Just wait - that really pissed me off.
Im sticking to delta because thats all i know. i dont know PI and i dont feel like looking @ tutorials all day.

  • Just wait bro. #Delta

Read full topic

gl

item.title: Player killing - Hybrid - DELTA
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“dylan.hurley, post:7, topic:426019”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=528704.msg3856452#msg3856452 date=1324385942]

There are no Tutorials for rewriting your ENTIRE combat base… That has to be done on your own.

If you want a server to start with that has a better combat system, try a Project Insanity Source.

Pi is a good idea but pi range is crap you would still need to work on that but it would be quicker than on delta (no-one plays delta’s anyway)

Then how come when I setup my cammy pvp delta I get 20-10 players online first day…?
[/quote]
It doesnt matter about first day how meny after a month?[/quote]

We reached 76 online at once O.o

Read full topic
